Detailed Description

template<typename Ordinal, typename T>
class Teuchos::ConstValueTypeSerializationBuffer< Ordinal, T, typename DefaultSerializer< Ordinal, T >::DefaultSerializerType >

Encapsulate how an array of const objects with value sematics is serialized into a const char[] array.

Specialization for the default serializer object type with a default argument for the serializer object parameter.
